sub_title: Psychology-informed web copy & blogs, for honest and bold brands ⚡ Fast track to greeting more of your ideal customers | Freelance, in English
summary:
You work on your business with so much honesty and passion! So, surely... people will take notice and come flocking 🧲 to buy your stuff ASAP… any time now… right?

🚩 Know what you want to say to your ideal customers, but have no idea how to make people listen? 
🚩 Not enough good inquiries coming from your website? 
🚩 Or worried you won’t make a great first impression with your website and blogs, so you find yourself NOT wanting to shout out from the rooftops that what you do is awesome?

Eek, you’re holding back the growth of your business! 

Are you open to an alternative?

Every time someone gets a chance to interact with your online brand and understand it better, there are so many psychological intricacies at play. Or, you know... when they decide to move right past you and onto your competitors. 

Most of these details aren't immediately visible to the casually-browsing eye. Yet your audience *feels* their impact. And acts on it. Each and every word matters - those you use and those you don't. 

Building connection is a fragile art (and science), so no wonder compelling writing is tricky to produce - even for the most intentional businesses. 

Actually, it's tricky *especially* for intentional business owners. Because they're already so up close and personal with their offering. And, let's be honest, they already wear tens of hats in their businesses, every day.

It's all good though. 👋🏻 I’m here to help you make your voice heard and make a splash in the vast online world, with zero overwhelm or hesitation, by strategizing with you and writing your high-converting website and blogs.

I'm here to show you that you CAN:
- stop second-guessing the impression you make on your audience
- position your business as a clear, trustworthy authority in your field
- start being confident that they feel authentically connected to you

The bottom line becomes clear: more sales, more impact, more freedom.

The better we express ourselves, the easier we can find our tribe: those we connect with, whom we can support, and who can support us back. 

I'll take care of your website copy and blogs in a get-sh#t-done style - which is hard to miss if you've ever had a taste of the tech startup scene: buttery smooth work processes, transparent explanations of what psychology principles work in your copy and where, and helping you work smart not hard. 

Do you see any value in us getting to know each other? Connect with me on LinkedIn with a quick message (just like you would in real life) or email me at laura@lauracreative.eu.

See you on the other side!

projects.title: Let's Team
projects.description:
This was an Erasmus+ Youth Exchange, in Lecce, Italy where I was a participant. The main themes were promoting healthy behaviors through outdoor activities, enhancing the team spirit and the value of differences and cultures and educate young people to intercultural learning and to a more positive attitude towards other people and cultures. The Youth Exchange was based on the non-formal approach and Learning by Doing methodologies with small/big group work, role plays, simulation exercises, debates, theoretical input and practical work, sports activities.

The main competences developed were: learning to learn, social and civic competences, sense of initiative and entrepreneurship, cultural awareness and expression, teamwork, building a supportive environment, networking.

contributors.headline: Psychology-informed web copy & blogs, for honest and bold brands ⚡ Fast track to greeting more of your ideal customers | Freelance, in English

projects.title: Vivid Mind
projects.description:
I was an organizing team member of a project including trainings and a conference in the area of Psychological research, for the Psychology students at University of Bucharest. We implemented a programme meant to help those students passionate about research in learning about hot research topics not included in the faculty curriculum, developing their critical skills in the field and having an in-depth look on how they could attain high quality research projects.
I was involved in planning the event, choosing topics, advertising it through Facebook and through posters within the Faculty. I was also in contact with the speakers.

projects.title: Mediation: a New Tool for Dealing with Conflicts
projects.description: This was an Erasmus+ Training Course, in The Hague, Netherlands where I was a participant. Its objectives were to enhance the participants' mediation skills for conflict transformation, to encourage us to implement effective communication protocols in our work, to raise awareness of and transfer basic skills about the potential of mediation as a tool for conflict transformation in society and to share realities and initiatives on mediation from different countries.

profile_positions.description:
Let’s get you on the fast track to greeting more and more of your ideal customers!

𝐈’𝐦 𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐞 𝐭𝐨 𝐡𝐞𝐥𝐩 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐦𝐚𝐤𝐞 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐯𝐨𝐢𝐜𝐞 𝐡𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐝 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐦𝐚𝐤𝐞 𝐚 𝐬𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐬𝐡 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐯𝐚𝐬𝐭 𝐨𝐧𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐞 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐥𝐝, 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐳𝐞𝐫𝐨 𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐰𝐡𝐞𝐥𝐦 𝐨𝐫 𝐡𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧, 𝐛𝐲 𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐳𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐰𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐡𝐢𝐠𝐡-𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐰𝐞𝐛𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐛𝐥𝐨𝐠𝐬.

We can go about it in 3 different ways:

‣ Website copy - For when you want your business to draw the attention of the right customers, plus resonate with them in a way that makes clear and compelling sense. When someone judges your brand by your website for the very first time, it’s a make-it-or-break-it moment. Have your brand’s words flow as their eyes gaze on their screens.

‣ SEO blogs - For when you want your business to be found by people with the specific needs and pain points that you can alleviate. Guide people toward solutions you truly believe in. And become a trusted expert while you’re at it.

‣ Mini website copy audit - For when your website knows how to walk, but hasn't learned how to fly yet. Let your brand take centre stage for one hyper-focused hour, under my warm and clear guidance. Roll up your sleeves and I’ll help you rewrite a website that sounds like you and works for you. 

𝐖𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐢𝐬 𝐢𝐭 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐰𝐨𝐮𝐥𝐝 𝐥𝐢𝐤𝐞 𝐩𝐞𝐨𝐩𝐥𝐞 𝐭𝐨 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐧𝐤 𝐚𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐛𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐝?
profile_positions.title: Website copywriter & blogger

profile_positions.description:
I was the recruiter responsible for the global expansion of our fast-scaling unicorn outside of the US, after the D-series funding, as well as the lead of the quarterly talent newsletter and a passionate contributor to several process improvements: employer branding, the career website, internal interviewer training, and role definitions. My main stakeholders were Directors and VP's, particularly in Engineering.

I recruited for several Clojure engineering roles from mid-level to senior staff, a mobile engineering manager role, a technical support role in Japan, and a customer success associate role for the DAHC region.

Our SaaS platform StudyTeam connects the big biopharma companies and over 4000 clinical trial sites around the world, empowering sponsors, sites, patients, technology vendors, regulatory agencies to communicate better and drastically improve the time it takes to bring new therapies to patients. Our connected technology foundation helps clinical research become integral to healthcare and the patient journey – not something that happens in a silo.
profile_positions.title: Senior Talent Acquisition Partner, Global

profile_positions.description:
In an increasingly digital world, Trengo envisions a smooth way of connecting people with the companies behind their products and services. Our software makes it easy for customer-facing teams to collaborate on conversations via multiple channels, all in one shared inbox. Email, Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp, live-chat, you name it. With an A-round investment of $36M lead by Insight Partners and Peak Capital, we are strengthening our position in the Netherlands and accelerating our rapid growth in Europe.

When you meet anyone who works at Trengo, you'll most likely find them excited about continuous improvements, empowered to add their own touch to the world of online communication and eager to collaborate with diverse people on the daily.

Roles I hired for: frontend and backend developers, QA engineers, infrastructure engineers, lead product designer, UX and UI designers, product owners, HubSpot marketing automation specialist, UX writer, product and business data analysts, recruiters, people business partner, performance marketer, country marketer.
profile_positions.title: Tech & Product Talent Acquisition Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Owned full-cycle recruiment processes for fast-growing companies such as: Hotelchamp, Polarsteps, Wehkamp, Asellion, Getaround, Media Distillery, Swipeguide.

Roles filled: backend, frontend, DevOps, Android, iOS, QA, customer success, tech support, business development, product owner, travel editor, office manager...

Full-cycle recruitment included: 
- sourcing, engaging, assessing and closing some of the best (tech) talent out there
- employer branding: defining and executing on a clear and attractive employer brand online, in job descriptions, career pages and social media
- managing up senior leadership stakeholders and co-creating hiring plans, interview processes and recruiting approaches, built for growth and quality
- data + creativity = insights to improve processes and strategy
- enabling the recruitment culture to mature, by training interviewers and hiring managers
- advocating for diversity and inclusion in hiring and team building
- performing competitive analysis in the market, including competitor practices, compensation, value proposition and other job & intelligence data, to improve our approach

LevelUp Ventures is a boutique full-cycle-recruitment firm that specialises in tech hiring for start-ups and scale-ups, from the heart of their offices. We get to know you, to then brand your true story at a higher scale and execute fast on the (often changing) hiring plan. We have warm approaches, techie solutions and a love for sharing best practices.
profile_positions.title: Tech Recruiter

profile_positions.description:
The Digital Insights and Conversion Platform for hotels. Driven by data. Focused on guests.

We would love to welcome a senior full-stack developer focused on backend (PHP) to our international team. Someone with wisdom and passion about PHP, since you would be responsible for the backend. The team are all full-stack developers and their strengths lie on the frontend (React, Redux, Typescript), where we invite you to contribute too.

Can you imagine starting work every day with a plan to make good decisions with your team, based on arguments and reason? Critique our code if you may, we like it. For people who don’t like pointless meetings, these 4 developers at Hotelchamp really make the most use of their time together in conversations - and then work independently, hands-on, in a mature tech environment. Moreover, remote work is the way to work in 2020, not only now with Corona, but in the future too - we only meet weekly, with the tech team, at our office in Groningen.
profile_positions.title: Tech recruiter (via LevelUp)

profile_positions.description:
It was exciting to make an impact on a product that millions of people use and love: Polarsteps. The collaboration with the 3 hiring managers was rooted in the premise of quality over quantity and by the end of the third month, this is what we had accomplished:
- talent mapping as critical for the sourcing strategy of Polarsteps
- the very start of analytics-based job pages, which helped us to understand the online behavior of potential candidates and to adjust our content accordingly
- frameworks and recommendations for phone screens and competency-based interviews
- 3 critical hires: sr. frontend engineer, head of community & support, travel editor
____

Polarsteps helps you to plan, track and share your journeys in an easy and beautiful way, turning your travel moments into lifetime memories.

The people at Polarsteps share a passion for design, code and travel. With Polarsteps we embarked on a journey with a clear destination: we want to create the best travel app in the world. This destination is not a place, rather it is a new way of seeing things.

We believe in travel karma – do good things to people you meet on your travels, and good things will happen to you. Want to do something back for us? Please spread the word!
profile_positions.title: Tech recruiter (via LevelUp)

profile_positions.description:
I worked as a full-cycle recruiter, hiring for the following roles: 6 backend developers, 5 frontend developers, 1 QA automation engineer, 1 DevOps engineer, 1 office manager, 1 customer success manager, 1 technical support manager and 1 senior business development manager.

Other initiatives I carried out were: onboarding coordination, training interviewers, people operations brainstorming, process definitions (structured interviews, structured evaluations, candidate journey).

The secret sauce for making it happen was:
- 33 g employer branding via eliciting emotions
- 33 g distilling the implicit values and needs of Asellion into ways of assessing them
- 33 g managing multiple role responsibilities according to priorities and dependencies
- love

Shortest time to hire: 8 days -> speedy alignment
Longest time to hire: 117 days -> passionate persistence 

_____
It’s our mission to bring progress, innovation and new commercial opportunities to the chemical industry, by enabling manufacturers and buyers to meet online. We help the industry to act faster, think leaner, sell more and waste less, via secure and branded webshops.

It’s our role to inspire the industry to think ahead, embrace new ways of thinking and operating. We have to lead, guide and show the future. Step by step. Fast or slow. Whatever happens, Asellion will lead the way.
profile_positions.title: Tech Recruiter (via LevelUp)

profile_positions.description:
This was my first time managing my own recruitment project via LevelUp. I had come in after a 1-year long search for a fitting DevOps engineer for the team. This time, we did it!

__
We provide a unique AI solution to generate Deep Content Understanding™ in real-time and at an unparalleled scale. The AI-based platform comprises a wide combination of Machine Learning methodologies to recognise every visual and audial aspect inside a video, from Face Recognition to Topic Detection. All combined together in a synergy approach, the different technologies provide highly accurate results.
profile_positions.title: Solo recruiter (via LevelUp)

profile_positions.description: Hired 2 data-driven product owners and helped out with several other roles.
profile_positions.title: Recruiter (via LevelUp)

profile_positions.description:
I helped hire Android and iOS developers together with the team.

__
At Getaround, we’re building a global platform to enable a future where all cars are shared. There are more than 1 billion cars in the world, and these cars are parked, on average, more than 95% of the time. With instant and keyless carsharing via our patented hardware and software platform and our industry-leading mobile apps, we’re helping communities around the world share these underutilized resources to reduce their vehicle footprint while increasing mobility solutions.

volunteer_experiences.role: Project Coordinator, International Day of Languages
volunteer_experiences.description:
I was the first to coordinate such event in my city, even as the youngest member of the AEGEE chapter. As a hands-on leader, I collaborated with team members to decide on the content of the workshops, maintained contact with speakers, promoted the event and presented it.

The project aimed to facilitate the basics of English, German and Aromanian languages to highschool and university students, in order to raise awareness of the advantages of learning foreign languages and to encourage the audience to start learning one.

volunteer_experiences.role: Human Resources, Social Erasmus and Be Buddy member
volunteer_experiences.description:
ESN UniBuc (Erasmus Student Network at University of Bucharest) is a non-profit student organization committed to help the foreign students coming to Bucharest through study or work internships have a pleasurable and eye opening stay. 

The activities I was involved in ranged from social and cultural events to helping people in need and raising awareness of hot social issues.
● Supported Romanian students in choosing and applying for paid internships and jobs abroad
I was part of both Train the Students and Personal Growth teams. I was member of the organizing committee of the second edition of an event on psychological research for students: Vivid Mind.

- organized and moderated the hackingHR meetup on Artificial Intelligence in HR https://www.meetup.com/HackingHR-Amsterdam-Chapter/events/262357655/
- connected people for, supported organizing and networked at several other meetups
__
We are inspired by the intersection of HR and technology. We hack HR by discussing the latest trends in HR and applying them into how we work, lead and inspire.

In the Amsterdam chapter, we organize monthly hackingHR meetups on various hot topics. Our meetups are different because of the extensive Q&A's where you can think information through and share ideas, a diverse crowd (from founders to HRM's to recruiters) and to-the-point talks.
